name: rasa_project
description: The Productivity Assistant Chatbot is a versatile tool designed to help users manage tasks, set reminders, and answer productivity-related questions. It is built using Rasa for natural language understanding and dialogue management, PostgreSQL for data persistence, and Twilio for SMS notifications. The chatbot is Dockerized for consistent deployment across development, testing, and production environments, ensuring reliability and scalability.
author: Blaise Alako
